const sha256_1 = require("@noble/hashes/sha256");

bn254 pairing-friendly curve. Previously known as alt_bn_128, when it had 128-bit security. Barbulescu-Duquesne 2017 shown it's weaker: just about 100 bits, so the naming has been adjusted to its prime bit count https://hal.science/hal-01534101/file/main.pdf

 
exports.bn254 = (0, weierstrass_js_1.weierstrass)({
    a: BigInt(0),
    b: BigInt(3),

    n: BigInt('0x30644e72e131a029b85045b68181585d2833e84879b9709143e1f593f0000001'),
    Gx: BigInt(1),
    Gy: BigInt(2),
    h: BigInt(1),
    ...(0, _shortw_utils_js_1.getHash)(sha256_1.sha256),
});
